;;;4194   void sk_in_drv(void)

                  watchdog_enable PROC
;;;10980  //-----------------------------------------------
;;;10981  void watchdog_enable (void) 
009dee  495a              LDR      r1,|L2.40792|
;;;10982  {
;;;10983  LPC_WDT->WDTC=2000000;
009df0  05c8              LSLS     r0,r1,#23
009df2  6041              STR      r1,[r0,#4]
;;;10984  LPC_WDT->WDCLKSEL=0;
009df4  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
009df6  6101              STR      r1,[r0,#0x10]
;;;10985  LPC_WDT->WDMOD=3;
009df8  2103              MOVS     r1,#3
009dfa  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
;;;10986  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0xaa;
009dfc  21aa              MOVS     r1,#0xaa
009dfe  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;10987  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0x55;
009e00  2155              MOVS     r1,#0x55
009e02  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;10988  }
009e04  4770              BX       lr
;;;10989  
                          ENDP

                  watchdog_reset PROC
;;;10990  //-----------------------------------------------
;;;10991  void watchdog_reset (void) 
009e06  21aa              MOVS     r1,#0xaa
;;;10992  {
;;;10993  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0xaa;
009e08  0748              LSLS     r0,r1,#29
009e0a  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;10994  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0x55;
009e0c  2155              MOVS     r1,#0x55
009e0e  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;10995  }
009e10  4770              BX       lr
;;;10996  
                          ENDP

                  SysTick_Handler PROC
;;;11002  //***********************************************
;;;11003  void SysTick_Handler (void) 	 /* SysTick Interrupt Handler (1ms)    */
